title: 服务器永久白天
author: 玖123
txt_content: 原版联机开的服务器，登陆插件都没安，不知怎么回事

replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D这个插件可以锁定一个世界的时间

replies.author: chenyuanzhe
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doDaylightCycle true
这样时间就不会变化
要让时间变化就改成false
注意doDaylightCycle的大小写

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doDaylightCycle [true/false]
true则会日月交替，false则停止。

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content:
china521 发表于 2016-8-26 21:32
/gamerule doDaylightCycle [true/false]
true则会日月交替，false则停止。
引用自WIKI
